Symbol.Script_3D:
!-----------3d--------------------- if show_el < EPS then end IF gs_detlevel_3D_m < EPS THEN END CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL one_ConID=0 returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, sMat, gs_InsMat, MEP_cline_pen, show_el gs_DuctMat = sMat IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
duct_show = duct_show*not(show_axis) PEN gs_cont_pen RESOL res
HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds = 30000
hceID_1 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+100 hceID_2 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+200 hceID_3 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+300
operatedMode = 0 addStatus = 0 IF GLOB_CONTEXT > 40 AND GLOB_CONTEXT < 50 THEN operatedMode = 1 addStatus = 8 ENDIF
XFORM MEP_Position[2][1], MEP_Position[3][1], dZx, MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[2][2], MEP_Position[3][2], dZy, MEP_Position[1][2], MEP_Position[2][3], MEP_Position[3][3], dZz, MEP_Position[1][3]
IF duct_show THEN ! -----> duct+connection <----- !
MATERIAL gs_DuctMat
HOTSPOT ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1, hceID_1 HOTSPOT ConPosX_2+ConLength_2*COS(ang), ConPosY_2+ConLength_2*SIN(ang), ConPosZ_2, hceID_2 HOTSPOT ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3, ConPosZ_3, hceID_3
branchLeftLength = branchLength - connectorLengthB branchRightLength = branchLength - connectorLengthC
ADDz -ductHalfHeightA
ang = branchAngle/2
PUT connectorLengthA, -ductHalfWidthA, 7+addStatus PUT connectorLengthA, ductHalfWidthA, 15 PUT mainLength+ductHalfWidthA/TAN(ang)-ductHalfWidthB/SIN(ang), ductHalfWidthA, 15 PUT mainLength+branchLeftLength*COS(ang)-ductHalfWidthB*SIN(ang), branchLeftLength*SIN(ang)+ductHalfWidthB*COS(ang), 7+addStatus PUT mainLength+branchLeftLength*COS(ang)+ductHalfWidthB*SIN(ang), branchLeftLength*SIN(ang)-ductHalfWidthB*COS(ang), 15 PUT mainLength+ductHalfWidthB/SIN(ang), 0, 15 PUT mainLength+branchRightLength*COS(ang)+ductHalfWidthB*SIN(ang), -branchRightLength*SIN(ang)+ductHalfWidthB*COS(ang), 7+addStatus PUT mainLength+branchRightLength*COS(ang)-ductHalfWidthB*SIN(ang), -branchRightLength*SIN(ang)-ductHalfWidthB*COS(ang), 15 PUT mainLength+ductHalfWidthA/TAN(ang)-ductHalfWidthB/SIN(ang), -ductHalfWidthA, 15
PRISM_ NSP/3, ductHalfHeightA*2,
GET(NSP)
DEL 1
IF flangeA THEN length = connectorLengthA halfWidth = ductHalfWidthA halfHeight = ductHalfHeightA halfWidthC = connectorHalfWidthA halfHeightC = connectorHalfHeightA
ROTy 90 GOSUB 200+shapeTypeA DEL 1 ENDIF
IF flangeB THEN length = connectorLengthB halfWidth = ductHalfWidthB halfHeight = ductHalfHeightA halfWidthC = connectorHalfWidthB halfHeightC = connectorHalfHeightB
ADD ConPosX_2+ConLength_2*COS(ang), ConPosY_2+ConLength_2*SIN(ang), ConPosZ_2 ROTz ang-180 ROTy 90 GOSUB 200+shapeTypeB DEL 3 ENDIF
IF flangeC THEN length = connectorLengthC halfWidth = ductHalfWidthC halfHeight = ductHalfHeightA halfWidthC = connectorHalfWidthC halfHeightC = connectorHalfHeightC
ADD ConPosX_3+ConLength_3*COS(ang), ConPosY_3+ConLength_3*(-SIN(ang)), ConPosZ_3 ROTz -ang+180 ROTy 90 GOSUB 200+shapeTypeC DEL 3 ENDIF ENDIF
IF ((MEP_cline_show and show_axis_and) or show_axis) AND operatedMode < EPS THEN ! -----> center line <----- ! PEN MEP_cline_pen LIN_ 0, 0, 0, mainLength, 0, 0 LIN_ mainLength, 0, 0, mainLength+branchLength*COS(ang), branchLength*SIN(ang), 0 LIN_ mainLength, 0, 0, mainLength+branchLength*COS(ang), -branchLength*SIN(ang), 0 PEN gs_cont_pen ENDIF
IF MEP_InsShow and show_isol and not(show_axis) THEN ! -----> insulation <----- ! MATERIAL gs_InsMat
ductHalfWidthA = ductHalfWidthA+MEP_InsThickness ductHalfHeightA = ductHalfHeightA+MEP_InsThickness
ductHalfWidthB = ductHalfWidthB+MEP_InsThickness
ang = branchAngle/2 ADDz -ductHalfHeightA
PUT 0, -ductHalfWidthA, 7+addStatus PUT 0, ductHalfWidthA, 15 PUT mainLength+ductHalfWidthA/TAN(ang)-ductHalfWidthB/SIN(ang), ductHalfWidthA, 15 PUT mainLength+branchLength*COS(ang)-ductHalfWidthB*SIN(ang), branchLength*SIN(ang)+ductHalfWidthB*COS(ang), 7+addStatus PUT mainLength+branchLength*COS(ang)+ductHalfWidthB*SIN(ang), branchLength*SIN(ang)-ductHalfWidthB*COS(ang), 15 PUT mainLength+ductHalfWidthB/SIN(ang), 0, 15 PUT mainLength+branchLength*COS(ang)+ductHalfWidthB*SIN(ang), -branchLength*SIN(ang)+ductHalfWidthB*COS(ang), 7+addStatus PUT mainLength+branchLength*COS(ang)-ductHalfWidthB*SIN(ang), -branchLength*SIN(ang)-ductHalfWidthB*COS(ang), 15 PUT mainLength+ductHalfWidthA/TAN(ang)-ductHalfWidthB/SIN(ang), -ductHalfWidthA, 15
PRISM_ NSP/3, ductHalfHeightA*2,
GET(NSP)
DEL 1 ENDIF
DEL 1
END
! ----------------- ! ! -- Rectangular -- ! ! ----------------- !
201: PRISM_ 10, length, halfHeightC, halfWidthC, 15, -halfHeightC, halfWidthC, 15, -halfHeightC, -halfWidthC, 15, halfHeightC, -halfWidthC, 15, halfHeightC, halfWidthC, -1, halfHeight, halfWidth, 15, -halfHeight, halfWidth, 15, -halfHeight, -halfWidth, 15, halfHeight, -halfWidth, 15, halfHeight, halfWidth, -1 RETURN
! ---------------- ! ! --- Circular --- ! ! ---------------- !
202: PRISM_ 4, length, 0, 0, 979, halfWidthC, 360, 4079, 0, 0, 979, halfWidth, 360, 4079 RETURN
! ---------------- ! ! ----- Oval ----- ! ! ---------------- !
203: IF ABS(halfWidth-halfHeight) < EPS THEN PRISM_ 4, length, 0, 0, 979, halfWidthC, 360, 4079, 0, 0, 979, halfWidth, 360, 4079 ENDIF IF NOT(ABS(halfWidth-halfHeight) < EPS) AND halfWidth > halfHeight THEN rrC = halfHeightC rr = halfHeight PRISM_ 12, length, halfHeightC, -halfWidthC+rrC, 79, halfHeightC, halfWidthC-rrC, 79, -halfHeightC, halfWidthC-rrC, 1079, -halfHeightC, -halfWidthC+rrC, 79, halfHeightC, -halfWidthC+rrC, 1079, halfHeightC, -halfWidthC+rrC, -1, halfHeight, -halfWidth+rr, 79, halfHeight, halfWidth-rr, 79, -halfHeight, halfWidth-rr, 1079, -halfHeight, -halfWidth+rr, 79, halfHeight, -halfWidth+rr, 1079, halfHeight, -halfWidth+rr, -1 ENDIF IF NOT(ABS(halfWidth-halfHeight) < EPS) AND halfWidth < halfHeight THEN rrC = halfWidthC rr = halfWidth PRISM_ 12, length, halfHeightC-rrC, halfWidthC, 79, -halfHeightC+rrC, halfWidthC, 79, -halfHeightC+rrC, -halfWidthC, 1079, halfHeightC-rrC, -halfWidthC, 79, halfHeightC-rrC, halfWidthC, 1079, halfHeightC-rrC, halfWidthC, -1, halfHeight-rr, halfWidth, 79, -halfHeight+rr, halfWidth, 79, -halfHeight+rr, -halfWidth, 1079, halfHeight-rr, -halfWidth, 79, halfHeight-rr, halfWidth, 1079, halfHeight-rr, halfWidth, -1 ENDIF RETURN
Symbol.Script_2D:
!-----------2d--------------------- if show_el < EPS then end IF gs_detlevel_2D_m < EPS THEN END CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL one_ConID=0 returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, MEP_cline_type, MEP_cline_pen, show_el
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds = 30000
hceID_1 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+100 hceID_2 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+200 hceID_3 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+300
ADD2 MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[1][2] HOTSPOT2 outCoords[10][1], outCoords[10][2], HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds HOTSPOT2 outCoords[1][1], outCoords[1][2], hceID_1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[4][1], outCoords[4][2], hceID_2 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[7][1], outCoords[7][2], hceID_3 DEL 1
IF gs_fill_pen THEN PEN gs_fill_pen if not(show_axis) then PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 3+32, 4, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS duct_show = 1, MEP_InsShow = 0, gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2
PEN gs_cont_pen if not(show_axis) then PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 2+32, 2+8, 0, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS duct_show = 1, MEP_InsShow = 0, gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2
IF MEP_InsShow and show_isol and not(show_axis) THEN PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 2+32, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS duct_show = 0, MEP_InsShow = 1, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2
IF ((MEP_cline_show and show_axis_and) or show_axis) THEN ! -----> center line <----- ! PEN MEP_cline_pen SET LINE_TYPE MEP_cline_type LINE2 outCoords[1][1], outCoords[1][2], outCoords[10][1], outCoords[10][2] LINE2 outCoords[4][1], outCoords[4][2], outCoords[10][1], outCoords[10][2] LINE2 outCoords[7][1], outCoords[7][2], outCoords[10][1], outCoords[10][2] ENDIF DEL TOP
Symbol.Script_1D:
!-----------Основной--------------------- success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_axis", show_axis) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_axis_and", show_axis_and) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_isol", show_isol) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_conventions", show_conventions) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_size", show_size) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "gs_detlevel_2D_m",gs_detlevel_2D_m) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "gs_detlevel_3D_m", gs_detlevel_3D_m) call "Показ_систем" PARAMETERS All isMep=1 RETURNED_PARAMETERS show_el, syst_name
call "common_param" PARAMETERS ALL
EPS = 0.00001
ductHalfWidthA = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12]/2+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] ductHalfHeightA = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13]/2+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] connectorLengthA = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] connectorHalfWidthA = ductHalfWidthA+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][15] connectorHalfHeightA = ductHalfHeightA+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][15] connectedA = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][18] shapeTypeA = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21]
ductHalfWidthB = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][12]/2+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] connectorLengthB = connectorLengthA connectorHalfWidthB = ductHalfWidthB+MEP_NumConnectionData[2][15] connectorHalfHeightB = ductHalfHeightA+MEP_NumConnectionData[2][15] connectedB = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][18] shapeTypeB = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][21]
ductHalfWidthC = MEP_NumConnectionData[3][12]/2+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] connectorLengthC = connectorLengthA connectorHalfWidthC = ductHalfWidthC+MEP_NumConnectionData[3][15] connectorHalfHeightC = ductHalfHeightA+MEP_NumConnectionData[3][15] connectedC = MEP_NumConnectionData[3][18] shapeTypeC = MEP_NumConnectionData[3][21]
flangeA = 1 IF MEP_NumConnectionData[1][15] < EPS OR ABS(gs_AddConnections[1][1] - 1) < EPS THEN flangeA = 0 connectorLengthA = 0 ENDIF
flangeB = 1 IF MEP_NumConnectionData[2][15] < EPS OR ABS(gs_AddConnections[2][1] - 1) < EPS THEN flangeB = 0 connectorLengthB = 0 ENDIF
flangeC = 1 IF MEP_NumConnectionData[3][15] < EPS OR ABS(gs_AddConnections[3][1] - 1) < EPS THEN flangeC = 0 connectorLengthC = 0 ENDIF
! ---------------- ! ! --- Z vector --- ! ! ---------------- !
dZx = -MEP_Position[3][2]*MEP_Position[2][3]+MEP_Position[3][3]*MEP_Position[2][2] dZy = -MEP_Position[3][3]*MEP_Position[2][1]+MEP_Position[3][1]*MEP_Position[2][3] dZz = -MEP_Position[3][1]*MEP_Position[2][2]+MEP_Position[3][2]*MEP_Position[2][1]
!!! +++ Transformational Matrix +++ !!!
DIM tMatrix[3][3]
tMatrix[1][1] = MEP_Position[2][1] tMatrix[1][2] = MEP_Position[2][2] tMatrix[1][3] = MEP_Position[2][3]
tMatrix[2][1] = MEP_Position[3][1] tMatrix[2][2] = MEP_Position[3][2] tMatrix[2][3] = MEP_Position[3][3]
tMatrix[3][1] = dZx tMatrix[3][2] = dZy tMatrix[3][3] = dZz
!!! +++ Input Coordinates +++ !!!
PUT ConPosX_1-ConLength_1, ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1 PUT gs_Connections[1][4], gs_Connections[1][5], gs_Connections[1][6] PUT gs_Connections[1][7], gs_Connections[1][8], gs_Connections[1][9]
ang = branchAngle/2 PUT ConPosX_2+ConLength_2*COS(ang), ConPosY_2+ConLength_2*SIN(ang), ConPosZ_2 PUT gs_Connections[2][4], gs_Connections[2][5], gs_Connections[2][6] PUT gs_Connections[2][7], gs_Connections[2][8], gs_Connections[2][9]
PUT ConPosX_3+ConLength_3*COS(ang), ConPosY_3+ConLength_3*(-SIN(ang)), ConPosZ_3 PUT gs_Connections[3][4], gs_Connections[3][5], gs_Connections[3][6] PUT gs_Connections[3][7], gs_Connections[3][8], gs_Connections[3][9]
PUT mainLength, 0, 0
Coordinates = NSP/3
DIM inCoords[20][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates inCoords[cnum][1] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][2] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][3] = GET(1) NEXT cnum
! --- the Matrix Operation, what make the Output-Coordinates
DIM outCoords[20][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates outCoords[cnum][1] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][1]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][1]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][1] outCoords[cnum][2] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][2]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][2]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][2] outCoords[cnum][3] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][3]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][3]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][3] NEXT cnum
z = MEP_Position[1][3] + MEP_Position[2][3]*mainLength PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_set_str[6][2] ui_set_str[1][1] = "(A) "+`Основная Длина` ui_set_str[2][1] = "(B) "+`Длина Патрубка` ui_set_str[3][1] = "(C) "+`Угол Патрубка` ui_set_str[4][1] = `Изоляция` ui_set_str[5][1] = `Толщина`
ui_set_str[1][2] = "mainLength" ui_set_str[2][2] = "branchLength" ui_set_str[3][2] = "branchAngle" ui_set_str[4][2] = "MEP_InsShow" ui_set_str[5][2] = "MEP_InsThickness"
pID = 6 ui_set_str[pID][1] = `Толщина стенки` ui_set_str[pID][2] = "mep_th_elem"
DIM ui_set_attr[7][9] FOR i = 2 TO 7 FOR j = 1 TO 9 ui_set_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_set_attr[1][1] = 1 ui_set_attr[1][2] = 3 ui_set_attr[1][3] = 220 ui_set_attr[1][4] = 50 ui_set_attr[1][5] = 127 ui_set_attr[1][6] = 90 ui_set_attr[1][7] = 15 ui_set_attr[1][8] = 128 ui_set_attr[1][9] = 23
DIM ui_vis_attr[6][5] FOR i = 1 TO 6 FOR j = 1 TO 5 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 4 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 6 ui_vis_attr[1][4] = 3 ui_vis_attr[1][5] = 4
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[3] ui_con_type[1] = 1 ui_con_type[2] = 1 ui_con_type[3] = 2
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN ui_vis_attr[5][2] = 4 ui_vis_attr[6][2] = 4 ELSE ui_vis_attr[5][2] = 0 IF MEP_InsShow THEN ui_vis_attr[6][2] = 0 ELSE ui_vis_attr[6][2] = 4 ENDIF ENDIF
IF MEP_InsShow THEN ui_set_attr[6][2] = 0 ELSE ui_set_attr[6][2] = 4 ENDIF
IF MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] = "0" THEN ui_vis_attr[4][2] = 4 ELSE ui_vis_attr[4][2] = 0 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_set_str = ui_set_str, ui_set_attr = ui_set_attr, ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 1, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 1
setPage = 1 ui_cur_page = 0 FOR j = 1 TO VARDIM1(ui_page_idx) IF ui_page_idx[j] = setPage THEN ui_cur_page = j NEXT j
IF ABS(gs_ui_current_page - ui_cur_page) < EPS THEN UI_PAGE gs_ui_current_page
UI_PICT 1, 30, 45, 156, 200, 1 ENDIF
Symbol.Script_VL:
! Duct Trousers ! Zsolt Feke/2008
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters
DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 1 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 0 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
VALUES "branchAngle" RANGE [30, 120] VALUES "MEP_InsThickness" RANGE(0, ]
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN LOCK "gs_DuctMat", "gs_InsMat" IF MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] = "0" THEN LOCK "useSysMat"
gs_ui = 1
ang = branchAngle/2
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 3
! --- 1st CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Основное`
ConDVecX = -1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = -1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(setProgram) THEN IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConDepth_2" THEN ConDepth_1 = ConDepth_2 PARAMETERS ConDepth_1 = ConDepth_1
ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_2 PARAMETERS ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_3 ENDIF IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConDepth_3" THEN ConDepth_1 = ConDepth_3 PARAMETERS ConDepth_1 = ConDepth_1
ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_3 PARAMETERS ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_2 ENDIF IF ABS(ConDepth_1 - ConDepth_2) > EPS OR ABS(ConDepth_1 - ConDepth_3) > EPS THEN ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_1 PARAMETERS ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_2
ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_1 PARAMETERS ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_3 ENDIF
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConWallThickness_2" THEN ConWallThickness_1 = ConWallThickness_2 PARAMETERS ConWallThickness_1 = ConWallThickness_1
ConWallThickness_3 = ConWallThickness_2 PARAMETERS ConWallThickness_3 = ConWallThickness_3 ENDIF IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConWallThickness_3" THEN ConWallThickness_1 = ConWallThickness_3 PARAMETERS ConWallThickness_1 = ConWallThickness_1
ConWallThickness_2 = ConWallThickness_3 PARAMETERS ConWallThickness_2 = ConWallThickness_2 ENDIF IF ABS(ConWallThickness_1 - ConWallThickness_2) > EPS OR ABS(ConWallThickness_1 - ConWallThickness_3) > EPS THEN ConWallThickness_2 = ConWallThickness_1 PARAMETERS ConWallThickness_2 = ConWallThickness_2
ConWallThickness_3 = ConWallThickness_1 PARAMETERS ConWallThickness_3 = ConWallThickness_3 ENDIF
isConLength = 1 IF ABS(gs_AddConnections[1][1] - 1) < EPS THEN isConLength = 0 ConLength_1 = ConWallThickness_1*isConLength PARAMETERS ConLength_1 = ConLength_1 ConPosX_1 = ConLength_1 PARAMETERS ConPosX_1 = ConPosX_1 PARAMETERS ConPosY_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1 = 0 ELSE IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[2][13] - ConDepth_2) > EPS THEN MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][13] PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13]
MEP_NumConnectionData[3][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][13] PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[3][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[3][13] ENDIF IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[3][13] - ConDepth_3) > EPS THEN MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[3][13] PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13]
MEP_NumConnectionData[2][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[3][13] PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[2][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][13] ENDIF ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, MEP_bEnableInsulation = 1, MEP_InsShow = MEP_InsShow, gs_ui = gs_ui, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, MEP_cline_show = MEP_cline_show
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[1][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[1][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[1][3] = "0"
! --- 2nd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Патрубок 1`
ConDVecX = COS(ang) ConDVecY = SIN(ang) ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = -SIN(ang) ConWVecY = COS(ang) ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(setProgram) THEN ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_1 PARAMETERS ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2 MEP_StrConnectionData[2][2] = MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] PARAMETERS MEP_StrConnectionData[2][2] = MEP_StrConnectionData[2][2]
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConWidth_3" THEN ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_3 PARAMETERS ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2 ELSE ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_2 PARAMETERS ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_3 ENDIF ConType_2 = ConType_1 PARAMETERS ConType_2 = ConType_2 MEP_NumConnectionData[2][21] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[2][21] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][21]
isConLength = 1 IF ABS(gs_AddConnections[2][1] - 1) < EPS THEN isConLength = 0 ConLength_2 = ConWallThickness_1*isConLength PARAMETERS ConLength_2 = ConLength_2 ConPosX_2 = mainLength+(branchLength-ConLength_2)*COS(ang) PARAMETERS ConPosX_2 = ConPosX_2 ConPosY_2 = (branchLength-ConLength_2)*SIN(ang) PARAMETERS ConPosY_2 = ConPosY_2 ConPosZ_2 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2 = ConPosZ_2 ELSE IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[3][12] - ConWidth_3) > EPS THEN MEP_NumConnectionData[2][12] = MEP_NumConnectionData[3][12] PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[2][12] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][12] ENDIF ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_2, ConPosY = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_2, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_2, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, gs_ui = gs_ui, MEP_bEnableInsulation = 1, MEP_InsShow = MEP_InsShow, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[2][1] = STR(ConToolType_2, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[2][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[2][3] = "0"
! --- 3nd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 3 ConName = `Патрубок 2`
ConDVecX = COS(ang) ConDVecY = -SIN(ang) ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = SIN(ang) ConWVecY = COS(ang) ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(setProgram) THEN ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_1 PARAMETERS ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_3 MEP_StrConnectionData[3][2] = MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] PARAMETERS MEP_StrConnectionData[3][2] = MEP_StrConnectionData[3][2] ConType_3 = ConType_1 PARAMETERS ConType_3 = ConType_3 MEP_NumConnectionData[3][21] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[3][21] = MEP_NumConnectionData[3][21]
isConLength = 1 IF ABS(gs_AddConnections[3][1] - 1) < EPS THEN isConLength = 0 ConLength_3 = ConWallThickness_1*isConLength PARAMETERS ConLength_3 = ConLength_3 ConPosX_3 = mainLength+(branchLength-ConLength_3)*COS(ang) PARAMETERS ConPosX_3 = ConPosX_3 ConPosY_3 = -(branchLength-ConLength_3)*SIN(ang) PARAMETERS ConPosY_3 = ConPosY_3 ConPosZ_3 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3 = ConPosZ_3
IF same_con THEN ConConnectorType_3 = ConConnectorType_2 PARAMETERS ConConnectorType_3 = ConConnectorType_3 MEP_StrConnectionData[3][1] = MEP_StrConnectionData[2][1] PARAMETERS MEP_StrConnectionData[3][1] = MEP_StrConnectionData[3][1] gs_AddConnections[3][1] = gs_AddConnections[2][1] PARAMETERS gs_AddConnections[3][1] = gs_AddConnections[3][1]
ConConnectorWidth_3 = ConConnectorWidth_2 PARAMETERS ConConnectorWidth_3 = ConConnectorWidth_3
LOCK "ConConnectorType_3", "ConConnectorWidth_3" ENDIF ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_3, ConPosY = ConPosY_3, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_3, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_3, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_3, ConWidth = ConWidth_3, ConDepth = ConDepth_3, ConLength = ConLength_3, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_3, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_3, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_3, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_3, ConToolType = ConToolType_3, ConStatus = ConStatus_3, ConType_3 = ConType_3, ConConnectorType_3 = ConConnectorType_3, ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_3, gs_ui = gs_ui, MEP_bEnableInsulation = 1, MEP_InsShow = MEP_InsShow, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[3][1] = STR(ConToolType_3, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[3][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[3][3] = "0"
! --- uploading of MEP_NumConnectionData
FOR k = 1 TO MEP_NumberConnections FOR i = 1 TO 9 j = 1+INT((i-0.5)/3) ad = 0 IF i < 4 THEN ad = MEP_Position[1][i] MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] = outCoords[j+3*(k-1)][i-3*(j-1)]+ad PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] = MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] NEXT i NEXT k
IF setProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ELSE ductHalfWidthA = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12]/2+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] ductHalfWidthB = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][12]/2+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14]
minLength = ductHalfWidthB/TAN(ang)+0.001 VALUES "branchLength" RANGE (minLength, ] minLength = MAX(0, -ductHalfWidthA/TAN(ang)+ductHalfWidthB/SIN(ang)) VALUES "mainLength" RANGE [minLength+ConWallThickness_1, ]
! ------------------- ! ! --- calculation --- ! ! ------------------- !
gs_list_area = (ConWidth_1 + ConDepth_1)*2*mainLength + (ConWidth_2 + ConDepth_2)*4*branchLength PARAMETERS gs_list_area = gs_list_area ENDIF
Symbol.Comment: Тройник воздуховода с дополнительными изоляцией и фланцем.
